Name: Jaffa 'Martini'
Ingredients: 30 ml De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of mini Jaffa Cake.
History: Created by yours truly in 2004. McVitie's Jaffa Cakes have a tangy orange jelly centre on a hardish sponge base, covered in dark chocolate. Back in 1991 these tasty little snacks beat off UK Customs & Excise who sought to reclassify them as chocolate biscuits, which, unlike cakes, are categorised as luxuries and so subjected to Value Added Tax.
